mappings.target: :journals/{publications.article.#.dblp_key} a :JournalArticle ; a :Publication ; dc:creator :authors/{_id} ; dc:title {publications.article.#.title}^^xsd:string ; dcterms:issued {publications.article.#.year}^^xsd:integer ; :appearsIn {publications.article.#.in}^^xsd:string ; swrc:pages {publications.article.#.pages}^^xsd:string ; foaf:homepage {publications.article.#.url}^^xsd:string .
